abstract: Los Angeles Kings center Jarret Stoll pleads guilty on misdemeanor cocaine charges; is sentenced to community service and will create program to teach dangers of drug and alcohol abuse to children.
lead_paragraph: Stoll pleaded guilty to two misdemeanor charges to resolve a cocaine case stemming from his April arrest in Las Vegas.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Kings’ Stoll Pleads Guilty in Drug Case

snippet: Stoll pleaded guilty to two misdemeanor charges to resolve a cocaine case stemming from his April arrest in Las Vegas.
